text: 11.22 Jem 2.5-6 Tɨtay dɨl? Kal nɨbi tap ñɨbɨlɨg ñɨg ñɨbɨlɨg gɨpɨm ak ma yek akaŋ? God binɨb ne pelpel apnan gɨpal okok nɨŋɨd, kɨli tap yokɨp yɨbɨl agɨl anɨgɨpɨm akaŋ? Mam ay yuwan nen mɨdebal okok, kɨlop nebeŋ awl dɨnɨmuŋ agɨl anɨgɨpɨm akaŋ? Nɨbop tay agɨnɨm? Nɨbi gɨtep gem nɨgen yɨp tep gup agɨnɨm akaŋ? Anɨgɨpɨm anɨb ak, gɨtep gem nɨgen yɨp tep gup ma agebin.
